ai-patthana15.17:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.17:1.1_0: And for the sake of the cause, not the reason for the teaching,
ai-patthana15.17:2.1_0: For the cause, what is the reason for the arising of the teachings, not for the arising of the teachings.
